revised_title: Improving the Ambe of Hippocrates for Reducing Arm Luxations
tldr: The author, M. le Cat, presents an improved version of the Ambe of Hippocrates, a medical device used to reduce arm luxations. The new design addresses the previous model's flaws, such as pushing the bone head into its cavity and limited movement directions. The improved Ambe offers better force, expedition, simplicity, and safety, making it a more effective tool for orthopedic surgery.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Orthopedic Surgery
